entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
